mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( user_id, goods_id, goods_name, goods_num, unit_price, total_price, shop_id, shop_name, remark, address, phone_number, consignee_name, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsNum}, #{unitPrice}, #{totalPrice}, #{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{remark}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{consigneeName}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM t_order WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_order SET comment = #{comment}, state = #{state} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
